<h1 align="center">
  Portfolio Boilerplate using Gatsby
</h1>

Kick off your project with this portfolio boilerplate.


## ðŸš€ Plugins

1.  **Content**
  gatsby-source-filesystem (sourcing data from local filesystem)
  gatsby-source-google-spreadsheets
  gatsby-source-wordpress
  gatsby-plugin-react-intl (i18n)
  + API sendinblue for mail contacts

2. **Layout**
  gatsby-plugin-sass
  gatsby-plugin-emotion
  gatsby-transformer-json
  gatsby-plugin-fontawesome-css

3.  **SEO**
  gatsby-plugin-react-helmet (seo)
  gatsby-plugin-manifest (web app manifest)
  gatsby-plugin-sitemap (create sitemaps)
  gatsby-plugin-robots-txt (creating robot.txt)
  gatsby-plugin-google-gtag (easily add ga to gatsby)

4.  **Optimisation**
  gatsby-image (optimized image)
  gatsby-plugin-sharp (with gatsby image)
  gatsby-transformer-sharp (with gatsby image)
  gatsby-plugin-offline (making site work offline)
